house_listing.house_description: One of the largest lots in bay colony! 14th fairway of the princess anne c.C. Beautiful hardwood flooring, woodburning fp, great sun room overlooking golf c. Azaleas, camelias in natural setting & landscaped! H-u-u-u-g-e floored walk-up staired attic! Bay colony opportunity. Haa warranty!!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Foyer, Garage DoorOpener, Ranch Style, Skylights, Storage Space, Sun Room, Utility Room,Walk-In Closet(s)
